comment: Used whole mason jar of FF yeast.  I let the boil go long and collected only 5 gallons, thus upping the OG.
Going to use this to replace 2nd pull from Grape Brandy Barrel.

You're an idiot and used some other beer for the second pull and then you drank half of said second pull that was supposed to go to Omaha for Home Brew Expo but it's okay because now this is FUNKY as Brett aroma gets, PEW!
